extends ActionRequest

        isValid

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldName

        java.lang.String getFieldName()
        Returns:
        name of the field to be created

      • getFieldType

        java.util.List<ExpectedType> getFieldType()
        Returns:
        expected types of the field to be created

      • getTargetSubstitutor

        JvmSubstitutor getTargetSubstitutor()
        Given: - target class: A<T> - expected field type: String - usage: new A<String>.foo

        To make newly created field foo have type T the substitutor is needed to provide mapping T -> String.

        Returns:
        call-site substitutor for the target

      • getModifiers

        java.util.Collection<JvmModifier> getModifiers()
        Implementation are free to render any modifiers as long as they don't contradict with requested ones. Example: if constant field is requested then it will be rendered with static final modifiers even if they are not present in this collection.
        Returns:
        modifiers that should be present when requested field is compiled

      • isConstant

        boolean isConstant()
        Constant fields may be used in annotations and in other constant expressions.
        Returns:
        whether the field must be a compile-time constant
